welcome_message_body: Welcome to Guli, China! Get ready to be charmed by the city's rich history, beautiful landscapes, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Guli has to offer.

restaurants.name: Italian Home
restaurants.description: Italian Home is a italian restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: 阿庆嫂土菜馆(永康市)
restaurants.description: 阿庆嫂土菜馆(永康市) is a chinese restaurant located in 金华市.
restaurants.address: 迎春路（龙川公园旁）, 金华市, 浙江

restaurants.name: McDonald's (麦当劳)
restaurants.description: McDonald's (麦当劳) is a fast food restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Macao Doulao
restaurants.description: Macao Doulao is a chinese restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Bullfighter Steak House
restaurants.description: Bullfighter Steak House is a steakhouse located in the city.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yiwu Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Yiwu Airport, mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network after completing a short registration process.
